column1: nor  have  they  pleaded  that  they  suffered  damages,  and  therefore,  they  are
not entitled to any relief in an application for Restitutio-in-Integrum.
The proviso to Article 138 of the Constitution is as follows;

column2: Provided that no judgment, decree or order of any court shall be reversed or

column1: varied on account of any error, defect or irregularity, which has not prejudiced
the substantial rights of the parties or occasioned a failure of justice.”
